name: ROGUE ARCADE
description:
In ROGUE ARCADE, you must fight through a procedurally-generated labyrinth of sentient arcade machines and drones who are out to destroy you. Find the key and make your escape!

This game was created for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam and the theme was "ARCADE": https://itch.io/jam/lm0b-beginners-game-jam-28

CREDITS

Sci-Fi Weapons: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/sci-fi-weapons-76726

Arcade Machines Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/arcade-machines-pack-02-lowpoly-p...

Drone Guard: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/robots/drone-guard-175607

MUSIC:  "Technopop 7b" by TeknoAXE: http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=297
